text: Karachi Division () is an administrative division of the Sindh Province of Pakistan. The Karachi Division was abolished in 2000 and five districts of Karachi were merged in City District Karachi. On 11 July 2011, Sindh Government restored again 5 districts of Karachi division.Five districts of Karachi restored, Published in The News International on 11 July 2011, Retrieved on 5 August 2012 In November 2013, a new district (6th), Korangi was formed by splitting District Karachi East. dawn.com, Korangi notified as sixth district of Karachi The News, Korangi made sixth district of Karachi ==References== Category:Divisions of British India Category:Karachi
title: Karachi Division
